00007   FixedController::FixedController(Intersection* i, SP38Simulation* sim, int os, int p, std::vector <int> pl ) 
00008     : intersection(i), simulation(sim), offset(os), phases(p), phase_length(pl) {
00009 
00010   }
00011   
00012   void FixedController::getAction(Observation& obs, Vector& action, bool computeGrad) {   
00013     assert(action.size() == 1);
00014     int ct = simulation->getCurrentTime();
00015     int current_phase = intersection->getPhaseIndex( simulation->getCurrentPhase( intersection ) );
00016        
00017     if(!simulation->isAnythingScheduled(intersection,ct) &&  
00018        ct - simulation->getLastRestartTime() >= offset + phase_length[0] &&  
00019        simulation->getCurrentPhaseDuration(intersection) >= phase_length[current_phase] ) 
00020       {
00021         current_phase = (current_phase + 1) % phases;
00022       }
00023     action[0] = current_phase;
00024   }
00025   
00026   void FixedController::write(std::ostream& o) { 
00027     for(int i = 0; i < phases; i++) {
00028       o << phase_length[i] << std::endl;
00029     }
00030   } 
00031   
00032   void FixedController::read(std::istream& o) {
00033   
00034     //cout << "reading settings" << endl;
00035     for(int i = 0; i < phases; i++) {
00036       o >> phase_length[i];
00037     }
00038   }
